name: wood sword
description: This sturdy, heavy bludgeon includes a guard for sparring and practice.

name: staff
description: A six foot staff is a valuable tool for any traveller.

name: knife
description: A simple iron blade for slicing and piercing.

name: spear
description: A spear is an effective weapon because it increase the reach of its wielder

name: hatchet
description: A hatchet packs a heavy punch in a small portable package.

name: tree axe
description: A tree axe is an unwieldy weapon, but strikes with sufficient force and consistency to fell a tree.  No sword can compete with that.

name: steel short sword
description: This sword is a real weapon, a soldier's blade that can keep any improvised weapon at bay.

name: steel bastard sword
description: A long blade suitable for use one or two handed.  Immensely lethal in the hands of a trained wielder.

name: ancient sword
description: This sword was produced with techniques that are now lost.  It seems to leap from your hand into battle.

name: mystic sword
description: A weapon that appears at times most suited to it and wielded by only those of legendary fame.
